sentences.cn: …一条钻石项链和与之相配的耳环。
艾丽斯有一串绿宝石项链.

sentences.en: Anyone returning the necklace will be handsomely rewarded.
sentences.cn: 送还项链者将得到丰厚的酬金.
据他估计,项链价值1000英镑.

sentences.en: My girlfriend badgered me to buy a necklace for her.
sentences.cn: 我的女朋友纠缠着要我给她买一条项链.

sentences.en: She had been hoodwinked into buying a worthless necklace.
sentences.cn: 她受骗买了条一文不值的项链。

sentences.en: She was wearing a coral necklace.
The bold necklace flatteringly lightens her skin tone.
sentences.cn: 这条光彩夺目的项链衬得她的肤色亮了起来。

sentences.en: The necklace consisted of amethysts set in gold.
sentences.cn: 这是一条金镶紫水晶项链。
这条项链上附有会给人带来灾难的符咒。

sentences.en: The swindler tricked the old lady out of her necklace.
sentences.cn: 那个骗子把老妇人的项链骗走了.

sentences.en: This necklace has been handed down in my family.
sentences.cn: 这串项链是我家祖上传下来的.

sentences.en: Would you like an amber necklace for your birthday?
sentences.cn: 你过生日想要一条琥珀项链 吗 ?

trans.tran_en: a string of jewels, beads etc or a thin gold or silver chain to wear around the neck

trans.tran_cn: 给（某人）戴火项链（将燃烧的轮胎挂在脖子上将其杀死）
